title: METALCRAFT MARINE
author: ''

r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $4.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with METALCRAFT MARINE. The average
  contract duration was 2.47 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $5.9M.
  The longest contract was 5.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $21.9M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '4.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '20%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '-93%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-10.2M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '2.47'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '5.9M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '5.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '21.9M'
